auth.title: Login
auth.enterPhone: Enter your phone number to continue
auth.enterCode: Enter the code sent to your phone
auth.welcomeDescription: Hello, {{name}}! You have successfully logged in
auth.codeSentDescription: Development mode: code sent to console
auth.codeSentDescriptionProduction: Check your phone and enter the code you received

empty.allDescription: There are no tasks available at the moment. Check back later!
empty.myDescription: You haven't responded to any tasks yet. Browse available tasks to get started!

task.alreadyAssigned: This task is already assigned to another volunteer

leaderboard.title: Where are the most volunteers?
leaderboard.addVolunteersDescription: Add more volunteers from your community and boost the ranking!
leaderboard.emptyDescription: Be the first to join and help your community!
leaderboard.inviteText: Join us as a volunteer and help your community! Together we can make a difference.

onboarding.selectProgramDescription: We are here to help bereaved families with whatever they need. We would love to get to know you better.
onboarding.selectSkillsDescription: Choose the skills you can help with
onboarding.selectCityDescription: Choose the city where you are located
onboarding.agreementWelcome: Welcome to the volunteer project! Please read carefully:
onboarding.agreementConfidentiality: Volunteers must maintain confidentiality about any personal or medical information of those receiving assistance, both during and after the volunteering period. Sharing or using this information for unrelated purposes is prohibited.
onboarding.agreementCommitment: Volunteers also commit to completing assigned tasks responsibly and following professional guidelines.
onboarding.agreementPrompt: Please check the box to confirm your understanding and start volunteering:
onboarding.agreementConfirm: I confirm that I have read and understood the agreement, and I will adhere to its terms.
onboarding.contactDetailsDescription: Please fill in your name and phone number .to start the volunteering process
onboarding.name: Name
onboarding.privacyConfirm: I confirm that I have read and agree to the
onboarding.addPictureDescription: Please add a profile picture so that people know :it's you
onboarding.thankYouDescription: We are currently in the process of building a stable community of volunteers. In the coming days, the project coordinator will call you to bring you on board.
onboarding.iAmWheelButton: I am a wheel - happy to help
onboarding.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
onboarding.agreementRequired: You must accept the agreement to continue
onboarding.noCitiesAvailable: Cities not loaded. Please refresh the page.
onboarding.citiesLoadError: Error loading cities. Please refresh the page.

pwa.title: Install App
pwa.description: Install our app to your device for a better experience and offline access.

ios.step1: Tap the Share button at the bottom of the screen
ios.step2: Scroll down and tap 'Add to Home Screen'
ios.step3: Tap 'Add' in the top right corner
ios.step4: The app icon will appear on your home screen
ios.note: Note: Make sure you're using Safari browser on iOS

android.step1: Tap the menu button (three dots) in the browser
android.step2: Select 'Install app' or 'Add to Home screen'

desktop.step1: Look for the install icon in your browser's address bar
desktop.step2: Click the install icon or use the browser menu

generic.step2: Look for 'Install' or 'Add to Home Screen' option

notifications.title: Push Notifications
notifications.description: Receive notifications about new tasks, responses, and updates
notifications.permissionRequest: Allow notifications to stay updated about new tasks and responses
notifications.permissionDenied: Notifications are blocked. Please enable them in your browser settings.
notifications.permissionDeniedHelp: To enable notifications, go to your browser settings and allow notifications for this site.
notifications.notSupported: Push notifications are not supported in your browser
notifications.statusEnabled: Enabled - You will receive push notifications
notifications.statusDisabled: Disabled - You will not receive push notifications
notifications.responseApprovedBody: Your response to task "{{taskTitle}}" has been approved
notifications.responseRejectedBody: Your response to task "{{taskTitle}}" has been rejected
notifications.testNotificationBody: If you see this notification, push notifications are working correctly!
notifications.testNotificationDescription: Send a test notification to verify the system is working. The notification will arrive even if you are on the page.

taskResponses.selectVolunteer: Select a volunteer to complete the task
taskResponses.taskNotActive: Task is not active. It may have already been assigned to another volunteer or completed.
taskResponses.approveForbidden: You don't have permission to approve this volunteer
taskResponses.rejectForbidden: You don't have permission to reject this volunteer
taskResponses.shareContactDetails: In order for {{volunteerName}} to come, the system will now share your contact details with him:
taskResponses.volunteerApprovedTitle:
The volunteer has been
approved! You will be
contacted soon.

categoriesNeedy.aiPrompt: Share what happened, and AI will create the task for you to edit and approve before saving.
categoriesNeedy.aiPromptRequired: Please enter a description of what you need help with
categoriesNeedy.noCategoriesFound: No categories found matching your search

categorySkillsView.headerSubtitle: Details will help us match the right volunteers to you.
categorySkillsView.privacyNote: Your details remain confidential. Volunteers only access the task description.

taskDetails.headerSubtitle: Details will help us match the right volunteers to you.

preview.title: New details have been received for the task you wanted!
preview.description: Come view the task details now so you can schedule a time to complete it

details.contactTitle: To carry out the task, please contact
details.completionNote: At the end of the task, please let us know that it has been completed, so we can feel at easeüôè
details.waitingApprovalDescription: Your response has been sent. Please wait for approval from the needy person.
details.differentProgramDescription: You cannot respond to this task because it belongs to a different program that you are not participating in.

respond.success: You have responded to the task
respond.differentProgram: You cannot respond to this task because it belongs to a different program that you are not participating in.
respond.alreadyResponded: You have already responded to this task.
respond.taskNotActive: This task is no longer active.

completed.title: You are amazing!
completed.thankYou: Thank you very much for all the help.
completed.worldBetter: Thanks to you, our world is a better place!

taskCompletion.feedbackDescription: We can't wait to hear your thoughts! Your feedback will be visible only to those who are looking for help, so it can truly make a difference.

errors.forbiddenDescription: You don't have permission to perform this action
errors.notFoundDescription: The requested resource was not found
errors.serverErrorDescription: An error occurred on the server. Please try again later
errors.networkDescription: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection
